## DisruptionManager.get() method

Get a disruption by id

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(disruptionID: string): Promise<Disruption>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

disruptionID


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The id of the disruption to get


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Disruption](./sncf.js.disruption.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

This example shows the disruption with the id

```javascript
const {Client} = require('SNCF.js');

const client = new Client();
client.disruptions.get('DISRUPTION_ID').then(console.log).catch(console.error)
```
